altername_name: Top Trumps Adventures Vol. 1: Horror & Predators
Top Trumps Adventures Vol. 1: Horror & Predators
name: Top Trumps: Horror & Predators
overview: Top Trumps Adventures: Horror and Predators is a video game for the DS, PC and PlayStation 2 consoles, based on the popular Top Trumps card game. It was published by Ubisoft. This release is the sister title to Top Trumps Adventures: Dogs and Dinosaurs, and is part of the Top Trumps Adventures series.
